attributes.action: Stop the puppy farm in Scotland even starting up
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Scotlands first ever puppy farm in Ayrshire even starting up as there's more than enough animals needing homes in rescues all over the U.K. & animals are still cruely being dumped now.

If puppies are going to be allowed to be bred should only be if you have a licence from your local council & also had a second approval from a well know animal charity or just be KC accredited
attributes.background: Stop scotlands first puppy farm in Ayrshire even starting up.

rejection.details:
This application is being considered by Easy Ayrshire Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out how to contact the council here:

https://www.east-ayrshire.gov.uk/CouncilAndGovernment/Contact-us/Contactusform.aspx
